titleStmt.title: Brief directions shewing how a fit and perfect model of popular government may be made, found, or understood
titleStmt.author: Harrington, James, 1611-1677.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: "Novemb. 13. 1658. Octavian Pulleyn warden". Partly inked out, perhaps indicating a printer's error.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
